quest.name: The Price of Betrayal
journal: Yusui is looking for an individual who can freely enter the Ruby Price.
objectives: Speak with Ikaruga at the Ruby Price.

dialogue.name: YUSUI
dialogue.text: You! Yes, you. Do you know of the Ruby Price─the fortress in middle of the Ruby Sea from which the bakufu soldiers survey the surrounding waters?

dialogue.name: YUSUI
dialogue.text: The other day, we found one of their men stowed away on a ship we confiscated. With a bit of coaxing, he eventually confessed to doing some underhanded trading with the Red Kojin on behalf of his superior.

dialogue.name: YUSUI
dialogue.text: Seems he thought he could avoid paying the Ruby Tithe by hiding aboard someone else's ship, but no one gets away with crossing our waters free of charge. As such, I am looking to track down this superior of his and have him compensate us.

dialogue.name: YUSUI
dialogue.text: If I try to sail to the Ruby Price and look for him myself, however, I'll be blasted to smithereens before I even make it halfway there.

dialogue.name: YUSUI
dialogue.text: Do you think you could go in my stead? There is a man by the name of Ikaruga there. He is an old friend and should be able to identify who our captive's superior is.

dialogue.name: YUSUI
dialogue.text: Please, go and speak with Ikaruga. He should be able to give you the name of our captive's superior.

dialogue.name: IKARUGA
dialogue.text: Ah, yes. Just the other day one of the soldiers deserted base. I suspect he is the man Yusui is after.

dialogue.name: IKARUGA
dialogue.text: Trade with foreign countries is strictly prohibited in our nation. The man, upon learning his subordinate disappeared feared he would be caught and turned tail and ran. If, what you told me is true, he likely went northwest of here to seek asylum with the Kojin of the Red.

dialogue.name: IKARUGA
dialogue.text: I am tempted to go after this man myself. Alas, that would require me receiving the necessary authorization, which could take days. Please, track him down and arrest him in my stead. If he resists, feel free to kill him.

dialogue.name: IKARUGA
dialogue.text: It will take time we do not have for me to receive the necessary permission to go after this felon. As such, I ask that you apprehend him in my stead. If he resists, you have my blessing to kill him.

dialogue.name: BOSS02673
dialogue.text: I would have to be a fool to agree to go with you! I am so close to the Red Kojin's settlement─so close to freedom!

dialogue.name: YUSUI
dialogue.text: Please, you must help me learn who is in charge of the man we have in captivity.

dialogue.name: IKARUGA
dialogue.text: Ah, so it seems he forced your hand. Perhaps his death was for the best.

dialogue.name: IKARUGA
dialogue.text: I will send word of all that has happened to Yusui, though I am not sure he will be happy to hear it... Ah, you are curious to know how I will inform him? That, my friend, is a secret. <wink>
